description: Microsoft has released the Windows Server 2022 KB5039227 and Windows Server 2019 KB5039217 cumulative updates with security fixes and fixes for a variety of bugs. [...]
title: New Windows Server KB5039227 and KB5039217 updates fix LSASS crashes

description: Microsoft is rolling out the KB5039212 cumulative update for Windows 11 version 23H3 with thirty-seven improvements and changes, including better drag-and-drop support in the File Explorer address bar. [...]
title: Windows 11 KB5039212 update released with 37 changes, fixes

description: Microsoft has released the KB5039211 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2 with 12 changes, including a Snipping Tool feature that allows you to edit Android photos in Windows. [...]
title: Windows 10 KB5039211 update released with new feature, 12 fixes

description: Today is Microsoft's June 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 51 flaws, eighteen remote code execution flaws, and one publicly disclosed zero-day vulnerability. [...]
title: Microsoft June 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 51 flaws, 18 RCEs

description: The City of Cleveland, Ohio, is currently dealing with a cyberattack that has forced it to take citizen-facing services offline, including the public offices and facilities at Erieview and the City Hall. [...]
title: City of Cleveland shuts down IT systems after cyberattack

description: A never-before-seen Windows malware named 'Warmcookie' is distributed through fake job offer phishing campaigns to breach corporate networks. [...]
title: New Warmcookie Windows backdoor pushed via fake job offers

description: The TellYouThePass ransomware gang has been exploiting the recently patched CVE-2024-4577 remote code execution vulnerability in PHP to deliver webshells and execute the encryptor payload on target systems. [...]
title: TellYouThePass ransomware exploits recent PHP RCE flaw to breach servers

description: Pure Storage, a leading provider of cloud storage systems and services, confirmed on Monday that attackers breached its Snowflake workspace and gained access to what the company describes as telemetry information [...]
title: Pure Storage confirms data breach after Snowflake account hack
